translations: n.遗迹；遗俗；纪念品（等于 relic）

sentences.sentence: This paper states the four aspects of value expression of geology relique and ancient biology fossil, analyzes the distribution of dinosaur geology resource in Yichun city and states how to use them.
sentences.translation: 阐述了地质遗迹及古生物化石价值表现的四个方面，分析了伊春恐龙地质资源的分布情况和状况，并对如何利用恐龙地质资源进行了论述。
